_header: Saint Germanus the holy man in Antissiodorum was I-bore
Subjects: saints’ lives; Germanus, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Germanus in one MS of the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint ierman þe holy man in anticiodence was I boreIn þe
                    toun of indegen of swyþe nobil more…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we alle to Ihesu crist for loue of seint
                    Iermaynþat he bringe vs to þe ioye þer þat he is
                    in
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 419-22.
